content:
isaacvetter opened Issue #352:

During HL7 FMG's review of the STU2 spec, they recommended linking to jira for issues (instead of gh), while also preserving the reader's ability to submit PRs directly.

isaacvetter closed Issue #352:

During HL7 FMG's review of the STU2 spec, they recommended linking to jira for issues (instead of gh), while also preserving the reader's ability to submit PRs directly.
